description:
A group of OpenAI’s current and former workers is calling for AI firms to protect whistleblowing employees who flag safety risks about AI technology.

The post Former OpenAI Employees Lead Push to Protect Whistleblowers Flagging Artificial Intelligence Risks appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Former OpenAI Employees Lead Push to Protect Whistleblowers Flagging Artificial Intelligence Risks

description:
SonicWall has shared technical details on a recently addressed high-severity remote code execution flaw in Confluence.

The post Details of Atlassian Confluence RCE Vulnerability Disclosed appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Details of Atlassian Confluence RCE Vulnerability Disclosed

description:
A critical vulnerability in the Progress Telerik Report Server could allow unauthenticated attackers to access restricted functionality.

The post Progress Patches Critical Vulnerability in Telerik Report Server appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Progress Patches Critical Vulnerability in Telerik Report Server

description:
CISA has added an old Oracle WebLogic flaw tracked as CVE-2017-3506 to its known exploited vulnerabilities catalog.

The post CISA Warns of Attacks Exploiting Old Oracle WebLogic Vulnerability appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: CISA Warns of Attacks Exploiting Old Oracle WebLogic Vulnerability

description:
The RansomHub ransomware group claims to have stolen the information of over 2 million Frontier Communications customers.

The post Ransomware Group Claims Cyberattack on Frontier Communications appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Ransomware Group Claims Cyberattack on Frontier Communications

description:
Roundup of the more than two dozen cybersecurity-related merger and acquisition (M&A) deals announced in May 2024.

The post Cybersecurity M&A Roundup: 28 Deals Announced in May 2024 appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Cybersecurity M&A Roundup: 28 Deals Announced in May 2024

description:
Cox recently patched a series of vulnerabilities that could have allowed hackers to remotely take control of millions of modems.

The post Vulnerabilities Exposed Millions of Cox Modems to Remote Hacking appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Vulnerabilities Exposed Millions of Cox Modems to Remote Hacking

description:
Android’s June 2024 security update resolves 37 vulnerabilities, including high-severity flaws in Framework and System.

The post 37 Vulnerabilities Patched in Android appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: 37 Vulnerabilities Patched in Android
